Text.Name: Item_BasePracticeDrug
Text.Desc: Pill made by immortal cultivators, it can regulate the five Qi within one's body and stimulate its potential, temporarily increasing Perception, Constitution and Intelligence by 30% for 48 hours. Significantly increases Foundation Training progress for outer disciples when consumed.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_JingYuan
Text.Desc: Improves the body's ability to generate Stamina, increasing Hunger Consumption Rate and Stamina Conversion Rate for 7 days.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_JingYuan2
Text.Desc: Improves the body's ability to generate Stamina, increasing Hunger Consumption Rate and Stamina Conversion Rate for 14 days.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_JingYuan3
Text.Desc: Improves the body's ability to generate Stamina, increasing Hunger Consumption Rate and Stamina Conversion Rate for 28 days.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_Ling
Text.Desc: Pill rich in Qi. Consume it to restore 3,000 Qi and boost Qi Recovery Rate for 6 hours. It is generally advised to wait with consuming after reaching the core shaping phase, otherwise the user might become injured or even die from not being able to withstand its potency.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_Ling2
Text.Desc: Dark purple elixir pill. Consume it to recover a large amount of Qi and increase Max Qi. Consuming it in large quantities significantly diminish the effect. Should only be consumed after having reached the Golden Core phase, otherwise the user might become injured or even die from not being able to withstand its potency.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_PracticeRate
Text.Desc: Pill made from Sage Fruit and Purity Leaves, it is capable of greatly accelerating one's thought process, doubling the probability of achieving Breakthrough. Lasts 24 hours. Consuming it in large quantities significantly diminish the effect.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_PracticeSpeed
Text.Desc: Pill made from Crimson Fruit, it is capable of boosting Cultivation Speed by 30%. Lasts 24 hours.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_CalmDown
Text.Desc: Pill made from Purity Leaves and Ice Crystal Powder, it can stabilize one's Mental State.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_Happiness
Text.Desc: Pill that can make one feel happy for 2 days, but it also decreases the efficiency of doing everything by 50%.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_NoHunger
Text.Desc: Consume Inedia Pill to gain the ability of Qi Absorption for 2 days, automatically recovering Hunger.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_NoHunger2
Text.Desc: Consume the Fasting Pill to become immune from hunger for 2 days.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_NoHunger1
Text.Desc: Consume it to replenish nutrients, reducing Hunger rate and Fatigue rate for 2 days.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_LostSoul
Text.Desc: Very basic mineral-based pill. Consuming this pill will cause one's brain functions to be repressed, putting the user into a coma for 3 whole days.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_DredgeQi1
Text.Desc: Medicinal powder made from Ginseng and Ganoderma, it can stimulate one's meridian channels and cure injuries with the "Spirit" tag.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_DredgeQi
Text.Desc: Pill that can neutralize the disordered Qi within one's body, it is capable of effectively curing injuries with the "Spirit" tag.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_WuLingSan
Text.Desc: Elixir capable of curing Inner Injuries with the "Metal", "Wood", "Water", "Fire" and "Earth" tags; relatively slow working.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_CureJinDamage
Text.Desc: Instantly cure Inner Injuries with the "Wood" tag.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_CureMuDamage
Text.Desc: Instantly cure Inner Injuries with the "Earth" tag.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_CureShuiDamage
Text.Desc: Instantly cure Inner Injuries with the "Fire" tag.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_CureHuoDamage
Text.Desc: Instantly cure Inner Injuries with the "Metal" tag.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_CureTuDamage
Text.Desc: Instantly cure Inner Injuries with the "Water" tag.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_CureFiveElementDamage
Text.Desc: Pill capable of curing Inner Injuries with the "Metal", "Wood", "Water", "Fire" and "Earth" tags; relatively quick working.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_Restore
Text.Desc: Stimulate the body's potential, repairing most old scars.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_ExtremeLofty
Text.Desc: Miraculous pill that can exploit the ways of heaven, it is capable of bringing one back from the brink of death, even when the subject has but one breath left. (Cannot be used when dying)

Text.Name: Item_Dan_HundredRefine
Text.Desc: Supreme Taoist elixir that only works the first time it's consumed. It greatly boost cultivation, but should be consumed after the Golden Core phase, otherwise the user might become injured or even die from not being able to withstand its potency.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_IncreaseLife1
Text.Desc: Pill that can prolong 180 years of life. It only works to the full extent the first time it's consumed, with subsequent consumptions' potency quickly diminishing.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_IncreaseLife2
Text.Desc: Elixir that can prolong 200 years of life. It only works to the full extent the first time it's consumed, with subsequent consumptions' potency quickly diminishing.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_IncreaseLife3
Text.Desc: Consume to prolong 500 years of life, as well as increasing the Five Attributes by 10% each. Only works to the full extent the first time it's consumed, with subsequent consumptions' potency quickly diminishing.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_IncreaseLife4
Text.Desc: Pill that can prolong 256 years of life. It only works to the full extent the first time it's consumed, with subsequent consumptions' potency quickly diminishing.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_IncreaseLife5
Text.Desc: Pill that can prolong 490 years of life, as well as postponing the coming of Heavenly Tribulation for 49 days. Only works to the full extent the first time it's consumed, with subsequent consumptions' potency quickly diminishing.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_IncreaseNeckCountdown1
Text.Desc: Pill that can postpone the coming of Heavenly Tribulation for 108 days. Only works to the full extent the first time it's consumed, with subsequent consumptions' potency quickly diminishing.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_IncreaseNeckCountdown2
Text.Desc: Deceive the ways of Heaven using the beast spirits within the nine Soul Pearl s, and postpones Heavenly Tribulation for 27 days. Can be consumed multiple times.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_SwordBall
Text.Desc: Elixir pill as recorded in Seven-Slaughtering Sword, it can be created by refining the essence of the five metals with the Alchemy Furnace. Do not swallow—ever.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_Defense
Text.Desc: Consume to enhance Body Protection Qi for 24 hours.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_Ling3
Text.Desc: Consume to restore 300,000 Qi, as well as increasing Max Qi by 100,000 for 48 hours. If one's Cultivation is too low, the user may die from the explosion of Qi reserve.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_FiveBase1
Text.Desc: Consume to activate your primeval Qi, increasing Perception by 30% for 48 hours. However, 3 years of life will be lost as a result.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_FiveBase2
Text.Desc: Consume to activate your primeval Qi, increasing Constitution by 30% for 48 hours. However, 3 years of life will be lost as a result.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_FiveBase3
Text.Desc: Consume to activate your primeval Qi, increasing Charisma by 30% for 48 hours. However, 3 years of life will be lost as a result.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_FiveBase4
Text.Desc: Consume to activate your primeval Qi, increasing Intelligence by 30% for 48 hours. However, 3 years of life will be lost as a result.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_FiveBase5
Text.Desc: Consume to activate your primeval Qi, increasing Luck by 30% for 48 hours. However, 3 years of life will be lost as a result.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_FiveBaseFromLife
Text.Desc: Consume to activate your primeval Qi, increasing Five Attributes by 10% each. However, 60 years of life will be lost as a result.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_Fail1
Text.Desc: Remains of a failed pill concocting process. There is strange power surging within, heaven knows what would happen to one who consume them.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_Fail2
Text.Desc: Remains of a failed pill concocting process. There is strange power surging within, heaven knows what would happen to one who consume them.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_Fail3
Text.Desc: Remains of a failed pill concocting process. There is strange power surging within, heaven knows what would happen to one who consume them.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_Fail4
Text.Desc: Defective pill that seems to have absorbed too much of the Alchemy Furnace's fire. Consuming it will cause one's five visceras to burn and Lifespan to diminish. But if one could manage to survive such an injury, it might yet bring some benefits.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_Fail5
Text.Desc: Remains of a failed pill concocting process. There is strange power surging within, heaven knows what would happen to one who consume them.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_TreeEXP
Text.Desc: Elixir that contains the heavenly power of creation. Consuming it allows one to feel the movement of Tao and obtain Inspiration from it. The quantity of Inspiration obtained is relative to one's Intelligence and Mental State at the time of consumption.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_Thin
Text.Desc: Elixir made by immortal cultivators. Consuming it makes a character's body slimmer.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_FaceLock
Text.Desc: Elixir made by immortal cultivators. Consuming it locks a character's current appearance.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_FaceUnLock
Text.Desc: Pill made by immortal cultivators. Consuming it restore a character's true appearance.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_FaceLock1
Text.Desc: Pill made by immortal cultivators. Consuming it to shape one's face as innocent as a baby's.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_FaceLock2
Text.Desc: Pill made by immortal cultivators. Consuming it to shape one's face as energetic as an adult's.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_FaceLock3
Text.Desc: Pill made by immortal cultivators. Consuming it to shape one's face as profound as an elder's.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_Fat
Text.Desc: Elixir made by immortal cultivators. Consuming it makes a character's body bulkier.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_Soul1
Text.Desc: Elixir made by utilizing Anguish Soul Gem as the catalyst. Consuming it grants Inspiration. However, 9 years of your Lifespan will be lost due to its cold and sinister potency.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_Soul2
Text.Desc: Elixir made by utilizing Spirit Soul Gem as the catalyst. Consuming it grants Inspiration. However, your Qi reserve will be damaged due to its intensive potency. Decreases Max Qi by 10.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_Soul3
Text.Desc: Pill made by utilizing Serenity Soul Gem as the catalyst. Consuming it grants Inspiration. Multiple consumptions will gradually enhance its potency. However, the user will be shocked by the residual consciousness of chaos, resulting in brain damage.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_Soul4
Text.Desc: Pill made by utilizing Serenity Soul Gem as the catalyst. Consuming it will burn a hundred years of one's Lifespan, granting extraordinary wisdom for 2 hours and hugely increasing the efficiency of gaining Inspiration. However, after the pill takes effect it will cause severe damage to one's mind, permanently reducing Intelligence by 20%. Consuming big quantities of it gradually diminish its potency.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_LunHui1
Text.Desc: After consumption, you can gain Inspiration from and be moved by this sequence of memory. \n[color=#D06508]This is in appreciation of the Stardom video series made by Xiaoyaosanren for giving me strength and joy![/color]

Text.Name: Item_Dan_ReBorn
Text.Desc: Pill created by utilizing Soul Gems as the catalyst and Soul Pearl s as the active ingredient. Consuming it will allow one to rebirth into a mortal with remolded body. It can save one's life even on the brink of death.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_ReBorn_4
Text.Desc: An elixir created by harnessing energies that resound from cycles of reincarnation. Consuming it allows one to be reborn into a new body, while retaining all previous Inspiration.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_LingYuanZhong
Text.Desc: Precious item created by combining Elemental Medicine with the Fortune Seed, it has many wonderful uses. When buried in the ground, it will automatically turn into spiritual veins and extend to all directions, slowly converting the surrounding terrain into Spiritual Soil or Spiritual Water. Wearing it makes one immune to cold and heat, albeit at the cost of a decrease in Attainment due to tricking the ways of Heaven. Consuming it greatly increase one's Max Qi.
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Bury
Text.StoryBnts.0.Desc: Bury this item in the ground.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_LingYuanSha
Text.Desc: Through a secret method, refine Fortune Seed into powder. Although its effect is reduced, it can be used as a medium to perform miracles multiple times to create fertile soil.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_LongDan1
Text.Desc: Elixir made from the primordial spirit of a Flood Dragon, consume to convert it into one of your sub-spirits, allowing you to control an extra Artifact. Only works the first time it's consumed.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_FengDan1
Text.Desc: Elixir made from the primordial spirit of Phoenix, consume to convert it into one of your sub-spirits, allowing you to control an extra Artifact. Only works the first time it's consumed.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_ZhuLongDan1
Text.Desc: Elixir made from the primordial spirit of Torch Dragon, consume to convert it into one of your sub-spirits, allowing you to control an extra Artifact. Only works the first time it's consumed.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_FenShen1
Text.Desc: Divine pill of the ancient times said to be made from a wisp of primeval Qi of clarity and turbidity from the world's creation. Its concocting method is long lost. By consuming this pill, one can reenact the creation of heaven and earth within one's Primordial Spirit, thus obtaining two sub-spirits. This pill can only be taken once during a lifetime. Only effective when one's Cultivation is at Primordial Spirit level.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_FenShen2
Text.Desc: Divine pill of the ancient times, its concocting method long lost. By consuming this pill one become aware of another self, generating a new sub-spirit. This pill can only be taken once during a lifetime. Only effective when one's Cultivation is at Primordial Spirit level.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_FenShen3
Text.Desc: Divine pill of the ancient times, its concocting method long lost. By consuming this pill, one can make use of its strong potency to forcefully generate a new sub-spirit. However, it will cause permanent damage to the cultivator's Mental State. Only effective when one's Cultivation is at Primordial Spirit level.

Text.Name: Item_Dan_TiShen
Text.Desc: After consuming it, you can use a double to participate in an auction, which allows you to escape immediately in case you don't bring enough Spirit Stones.

Text.Name: Item_QiZhi
Text.Desc: Can be fed to wild animals, making them enlightened and entering the Awakening State.

Text.Name: Item_Fall_LingZhi
Text.Desc: Improves the Qi of Metal element, so that the animal can gain a deeper understanding of autumn and feel its corresponding thought.

Text.Name: Item_Winter_LingZhi
Text.Desc: Improves the Qi of Water element, so that the animal can gain a deeper understanding of winter and feel its corresponding thought.

Text.Name: Item_Spring_LingZhi
Text.Desc: Improves the Qi of Wood element, so that the animal can gain a deeper understanding of spring and feel its corresponding thought.

Text.Name: Item_Summer_LingZhi
Text.Desc: Improves the Qi of Fire element, so that the animal can gain a deeper understanding of summer and feel its corresponding thought.

Text.Name: Item_Earth_LingZhi
Text.Desc: Improves the Qi of Earth element, so that the animal can gain a deeper understanding of earth and feel its corresponding thought.
